name: Adventure Time Game (bananabobs2004)
description:
A wizard who has traveled a long way from home and needs your help back home through the scary forest and underground caves/tunnel, This Wizard has powers to teleport lost ghost souls into a different dimension away from the real world.

Your task is to creep through all the forests and collect coins to help buy items in future levels and gain keys in hidden areas to help the wizard get access to abandoned builds for the ones which may be locked!

Can you put up this crazy adventure challenge that is waiting for YOU!

join the wizard's crazy adventure by downloading the game NOW!
